roleset.name: sequence DNA using chemiluminescent enzymatic reactions
roleset.note: PYROSEQUENCE-V, PYROSEQUENCING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for THYME.

example.name: pyrosequence-v
example.text: In our case study we pyrosequenced the 23S rRNA -. 5S rRNA ITS region of the E. coli genome.
example.arg: the 23S rRNA -. 5S rRNA ITS region of the E. coli genome.

example.name: pyrosequencing-n
example.text: Mutation analyses were performed using polymerase chain reaction -LRB- PCR -RRB- and pyrosequencing for codon 132 of the IDH1 gene and codon 172 of the IDH2 gene on DNA extracted from parraffin - embedded tissue .
example.arg: for codon 132 of the IDH1 gene and codon 172 of the IDH2 gene
on DNA extracted from parraffin - embedded tissue
